


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isFunction ```


Check if the passed value is a js function

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isFunction from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/function'
if (isFunction(function() {})) {
  // do something
}
```
